column1: Smoque BBQ////SIDES: Green Street's beans are the best. Smoque's are smokier
column3: and maybe a little watery. Still good. Smoque's cornbread is tasty but small. Their coleslaw is vinegary (a plus) and full of raw onion (which I found to be not great). Their mac n cheese is tasty
column4: but I'm not a mac n cheese guy with BBQ. Green Street's sides are more varied and bigger. But neither place has collards! WHERE ARE THE COLLARD GREENS
